citeinfo.origin: City of Los Angeles, Department of City Planning
citeinfo.title: Community Plan Areas (Polygon)

pubinfo.publish: City of Los Angeles, Department of City Planning

descript.abstract: Polygon feature class containing the boundaries for the Community Plan Areas.
descript.purpose: Community Plan Areas (CPA) are subdivisions of the City of Los Angeles for the purpose of promoting sound planning practices and fostering a reasonable mix of land uses. There are thity-five (35) Community Plan Areas. Community Plan Areas were defined by City ordinance in the early 1960s and the naming convention is generally designated by hyphenated groupings of neighborhoods and communities.
descript.supplinf: Also includes the Master Plan boundaries for the Port of Los Angeles and Los Angeles International Airport

place.placekey: Mission Hills - Panorama City - North Hills
Sherman Oaks - Studio City - Toluca Lake - Cahuenga Pass
Sunland - Tujunga - Lake View Terrace - Shadow Hills - East La Tuna Canyon
Canoga Park - Winnetka - Woodland Hills - West Hills
Silver Lake - Echo Park - Elysian Valley

horizpa.horizpar: Community Plan Area (CPA) boundaries are based upon the Department of Public Works, Bureau of Engineering "LANDBASE" or "STREET CENTERLINE" data sets. Boundaries not conforming to features within the "LANDBASE" or "STREET CENTERLINE" data sets have been interpreted from calculations using the "LANDBASE" or "STREET CENTERLINE" data sets as reference points. Boundaries such as the shoreline (tidal boundaries) are based upon Thomas Brothers, Inc. or USGS data sets.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

lineage.Process: FeatureClassToFeatureClass "Database Connections\68GGISDB as MNTUSER.sde\MNT.DCP_Projects\MNT.DCP_CPA_PLY" C:\Home\DCP.gdb\Features DCP_CPA_PLY # "CPA_NUM "CPA_NUM" true true false 2 Short 0 4 ,First,#,Database Connections\68GGISDB as MNTUSER.sde\MNT.DCP_Projects\MNT.DCP_CPA_PLY,CPA_NUM,-1,-1;NAME_ALF "NAME_ALF" true true false 75 Text 0 0 ,First,#,Database Connections\68GGISDB as MNTUSER.sde\MNT.DCP_Projects\MNT.DCP_CPA_PLY,NAME_ALF,-1,-1;SHAPE_AREA "SHAPE_AREA" false false true 0 Double 0 0 ,First,#,Database Connections\68GGISDB as MNTUSER.sde\MNT.DCP_Projects\MNT.DCP_CPA_PLY,SHAPE.AREA,-1,-1;SHAPE_LEN "SHAPE_LEN" false false true 0 Double 0 0 ,First,#,Database Connections\68GGISDB as MNTUSER.sde\MNT.DCP_Projects\MNT.DCP_CPA_PLY,SHAPE.LEN,-1,-1" #
